name: pv
description: Present value of an investment

name: fv
description: Future value of an investment

name: r
description: Estimated annual interest rate

name: n
description: Time of the investment

name: pv_oa
description: Present value of an ordinary annuity

name: fv_oa
description: Future value of an ordinary annuity

name: pv_ad
description: Present value of an annuity due

name: fv_ad
description: Future value of an annuity due

name: pmt_oa_pv
description: Payment value of ordinary annuity, given present value

name: pmt_oa_fv
description: Payment value of ordinary annuity, given future value

name: pva_oa_d
description: Present value of ordinary annuity with deferral period

name: pv_p
description: Present value of a non-growing perpetuity without a deferral period

name: pv_p_d
description: Present value of a non-growing perpetuity with a deferral period

name: pv_p_g
description: Present value of a growing perpetuity without a deferral period

name: pv_p_gd
description: Present value of a growing perpetuity with a deferral period

name: pv_mr_fv
description: Present value of an investment with payments per year, given future value

name: pv_mr_pmt
description: Present value of an investment with payments per year, given payment value

name: pmt_mr_pv
description: Payment value given a set of payments per year and present value

name: fv_mr_pv
description: Future value given a set number of payments per year and present value

name: npv
description: Returns the net present value with cash flows that are different

name: npv_sameFlows
description: Returns the net present value with cash flows that are the same value

name: simpleInterest
description: Returns the simple interest earned

name: compoundInterest
description: Returns the compound interest earned

name: util_doubleMoney
description: Estimated time to double money on an investment
